name: Cornerstone
description:
Brickout with a different set of limitations.
What if you could move the paddle in any direction?
What if the ball perpetually bounced?
What if you got a game over when your paddle leaves the game area, rather than the ball?
What if the ball could nudge the paddle around?

This is largely just a godot experiment right now, and my first time uploading any game to itch.io as well.
